remarks: Properties that determine an Abelian group operation.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isabli.1 $e |- G e. GrpOp $.
isabli.2 $e |- dom G = ( X X. X ) $.
isabli.3 $e |- ( ( x e. X /\ y e. X ) -> ( x G y ) = ( y G x ) ) $.
isabloi $p |- G e. AbelOp $.
$d G x y $.
$d X x y $.
